title: Personality & Preference Survey

elements.name: intro_text
elements.title:
Welcome to the Personality & Preference Survey

This survey explores your personality traits and work preferences to better understand how you approach tasks, decision-making, and collaboration.

elements.name: personality_planning
elements.title: When starting a complex task, how likely are you to plan out each step before diving in?
elements.minRateDescription: Jump in and adjust as I go

elements.name: personality_stress_mindset
elements.title: When working under pressure, what best describes your typical mindset?

elements.name: working_env_preference
elements.title: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your preferred working environment?

elements.name: working_env_team_comfort
elements.title: On a scale of 1 (Independent) to 10 (Collaborative), what is your comfort level with working in a team?

elements.name: working_env_type
elements.title: What type of work environment do you prefer?

elements.name: goal_focus_preference
elements.title: I tend to focus more on goals that are:

elements.name: organizational_style
elements.title: On a scale of 1 (Minimal Organization) to 10 (Highly Organized), how would you describe your organizational style?

elements.name: motivation_source
elements.title: On a scale of 1 to 10, where does most of your motivation come from?

completedHtml: Thank you for completing the Personality Assessment!
